name: Ares
description: Ares, god of war, mutiny, slaughter and riot, is fierce beyond measure. Clad in feathered armor and leather bracers, he wields a terrifying circular saw, embodying unstoppable might.

skills.name: Battlefield Storm
skills.description: Ares swings his weapon, dealing DMG equal to 100% of ATK per sec to surrounding enemies for 6s. He is immune to Crowd Control for the duration.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG per sec to 110% ATK.
upgrades.level3: Gains a shield equal to 200% of ATK when the Ultimate ends.

skills.name: Flesh Grinder
skills.description: Ares deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to nearby enemies and reduces their Armor by 15% for 6s.

skills.name: Unyielding Will
skills.description: The first time Ares takes lethal DMG, he becomes immune to the lethal DMG and gains immunity to all DMG & Crowd Control for the next 5s (it can only trigger once per battle).

upgrades.level2: Permanently increases Lifesteal by 20% upon triggering.
upgrades.level4: Permanently increases Lifesteal by 30% upon triggering.

skills.name: War God Spirit
skills.description: Ares's ATK increases as his HP drops, with a maximum boost of 90% ATK.

upgrades.level3: Also gains up to 30% CRIT Rate.

passive.name: Flesh Grinder
passive.description: Ares deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to nearby enemies and reduces their Armor by 15% for 6s.

relic.name: Celestial Dusk
relic.description: During Battlefield Storm, Ares takes 80% reduced DMG.

upgrades.level2: While Battlefield Storm is active, Ares gains a shield equal to 200% ATK upon defeating an enemy. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: During Battlefield Storm, Ares is immune to all DMG, and this does not affect the duration of other immunity skills. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: While Battlefield Storm is active, Ares gains a shield equal to 240% ATK upon defeating an enemy. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)
